stimulusHtml: In which two countries were the following economic policies pursued to increase the power of the ruling party ?
choicesHtml: Special Economic Zones (SEZs) in China and nationalized oil in Mexico
Private control of resources in the United Kingdom and privatization in Russia
Nationalization of oil and gas in Russia and state ownership of the Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC) in Nigeria
Increased trade in Iran and Special Economic Zones (SEZs) in Russia
